title.rendered: Upto 40% off on all International destinations in Aegean Airlines.Offer valid for bookings until 12.01.2019

content.rendered:
All international destinations with up to 40%

The offer is valid for direct flights from/to Athens, Thessaloniki, Heraklion, Rhodes, Kalamata, Mykonos and Santorini to all international destinations.

Fly to Greece! Save up to 40%!

The offer is valid for direct flights from/to all international destinations to Athens, Thessaloniki, Heraklion, Rhodes and Kalamata.
In addition, the offer is valid for direct flights operated to/from Tel Aviv to Larnaka – for one way and return flights.

Athens, Thessaloniki, Mykonos, Santorini and Tel Aviv with up to 40%

The offer is valid for direct flights from/to Larnaka to Athens, Thessaloniki, Mykonos, Santorini and Tel Aviv.

Bookings until : 12.01.2019

Travel between 01.03.2019 – 26.10.2019

01.03.2019 – 17.04.2019: 20%
06.05.2019 – 20.06.2019: 30%
09.09.2019 – 26.10.2019: 40%

View other offer here

To book tickets click here

Terms & Conditions:

Offer is valid for direct flights to/from Athens, Thessaloniki, Heraklion, Rhodes, Kalamata, Mykonos and Santorini to all international destinations – for one way and return flights. The offer is valid for bookings until 12.01.2019 and for travel from 01.03.2019 until 26.10.2019. The following periods are not included in the offer: 11.04.2019 – 05.05.2019, 07.06.2019 – 11.06.2019 & 21.06.2019 – 08.09.2019. 20% discount is applied on all direct flights during the period of 01.03.2019 – 17.04.2019. 30% discount is applied on all direct flights during the period of 06.05.2019 – 20.06.2019. 40% discount is applied on all direct flights during the period of 09.09.2019 – 26.10.2019. The 20%, 30% & 40% discounts are applied on all direct fares and fuel surcharges. Fares and fuel surcharges shown on the reservation system are already reduced by 20%, 30% & 40%. Discount does not apply on all taxes. There is no applicable fee for debit and credit cards for tickets purchased through aegeanair.com. In case of ticket change there are relevant charges depending on fare class. In case of ticket cancellation refund policy is applied depending on fare class. The offer is valid for Economy Class fares. One hand luggage up to 8kg is allowed on GoLight fares.
